welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Erba, a charming town known for its breathtaking beauty and rich history. We invite you to explore our streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the magic of Erba. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost airlines and some international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi for up to 2 hours. Premium wifi is also available for purchase.
